name: kobo-instapaper-proxy-lambda
description: Lambda handler that renders pages through headless Chrome and rewrites links for a proxy.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && CHROMIUM_SKIP_DOWNLOAD=true PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=true npm ci --ignore-scripts && npx esbuild src/handler.js --bundle --minify --platform=node --format=esm --target=node20 --outfile=dist/src/handler.js --external:@sparticuz/chromium && node -e "const fs=require('fs');fs.mkdirSync('dist',{recursive:true});fs.writeFileSync('dist/package.json',JSON.stringify({type:'module'},null,2));"
